source:
raheem sterling was told in no uncertain terms by liverpool supporters that they expect him to remain at the club this summer on the day he was parading the club 's new home kit at anfield .
the new gingham design , presented to supporters at anfield on friday , is the first offering from us sports brand new balance , who struck a record-breaking £ 300million four-year kit deal to replace sister company warrior as liverpool 's suppliers .
the message was ` hold nothing back ' as sterling , daniel sturridge , martin skrtel and simon mignolet unveiled the new home strip to fans in the centenary stand on friday afternoon .
raheem sterling ( 2nd r ) models liverpool 's new kit alongside ( l-r ) adam lallana , daniel sturridge , jordan henderson and philippe coutinho
the liverpool stars , including goalkeeper simon mignolet in his new jersey , made their way to anfield to present the kit to the fans
sturridge uploaded these photographs to his instagram account as he posed with sterling , mignolet and skrtel at the launch
new balance struck a record-breaking £ 300million four-year kit deal to replace sister company warrior as liverpool 's suppliers
it looks like ( l-r ) skrtel , mignolet , sterling and sturridge will all remain at liverpool this season after unveiling in the new strip
fans pack into the centenary stand on friday afternoon to catch a glimpse of the new balance strip
raheem sterling ( left ) and daniel sturridge ( right ) sit on stage while a q&a is conducted at anfield
the players arrive at anfield as they prepare for the launch of the 2015/16 strip
only a week ago , sterling held nothing back with his stunning interview after rejecting a new £ 100,000-a-week deal at liverpool .
he also sensationally revealed that he was flattered to be linked with arsenal to cast a huge question mark over his future .
but liverpool are adamant that the 20-year-old , who has two years left to run on his contract , will not be quitting this summer and are putting their shirt on him to stay .
one fan shouted ` make sure we see you in that next season ' at sterling , and the heckle was greeted with applause .
sterling told an expectant audience : ` the fans are great .
it 's a massive boost when you come out of the changing room and hear them sing that song .
you ca n't get better than that .
while players also turned their attention to the fa cup semi-final against aston villa at wembley next weekend .
` it 's special to play at wembley , especially because it 's my home town , ' sterling said .
and sturridge added : ` winning the fa cup would be huge for everyone - players , fans and staff .
we all want to have some success and we hope it 's this season .
winning the cup could be a platform for more success in the future .
` it 's great to play in front of these fans .
it 's an unbelievable feeling .
it 's a cliche but it 's true , they are our 12th man .
every week we try to get 3 points for the fans .
they mean a lot to us . '
( l-r ) sturridge , emre can , martin skrtel , simon mignolet and coutinho pose with ` hold nothing back ' the message in the background
the memorial flame and number 96 is also on the shirt in tribute to the casualties at the hillsborough disaster in 1989
liverpool 's 2015/16 home kit ( left ) and the home goalkeepers jersey ( right ) have been designed by sponsors new balance
a close-up of the new liverpool kit for 2015/16 , which is us sports brand new balance 's first for the club
liverpool legends robbie fowler and ian rush ( left ) were also at the launch of the kit at anfield
sterling is seen here wearing the new kit inside the club 's home dressing room alongside team-mates sturridge , henderson , adam lallana and phillipe coutinho .
brazilian coutinho was the hero in midweek as he helped brendan rodgers ' side bounce back from last weekend 's bruising barclays premier league defeat by arsenal with a fine finish to book liverpool a semi-final showdown with aston villa at wembley next sunday .
although departing captain steven gerrard wo n't be around to model liverpool 's new kit next season , his dream of bowing out in the fa cup final on his birthday , may 31 , remains alive .
the new shirt features all white branding -- the new balance logo , the liverbird and the standard chartered logo , whilst there is an all-new style of collar .
skrtel said : ` it 's a great design , i just hope it will bring us some luck and success . '
the full home kit which brendan rodgers ' players will be wearing at liverpool during the 2015/16 season
raheem sterling told the bbc that he had rejected a £ 100,000-a-week contract at liverpool prompting talk that he could leave the club
summary: The passage discusses the unveiling of Liverpool's new home kit for the 2015/16 season, designed by US sports brand New Balance. The kit was presented at Anfield by several Liverpool players, including Raheem Sterling, Daniel Sturridge, Martin Skrtel, and Simon Mignolet. Fans were present and expressed their expectation for Sterling to remain at the club this summer. Sterling, along with other players, also spoke about their excitement for the FA Cup semi-final against Aston Villa at Wembley and their desire to win the FA Cup. The new kit features all-white branding and a new style of collar. Raheem Sterling had previously rejected a £100,000-a-week contract at Liverpool, but the club is adamant that he will not be leaving this summer. The kit is a tribute to the casualties at the Hillsborough disaster in 1989, as the memorial flame and number 96 are on the shirt. Liverpool legends Robbie Fowler and Ian Rush were also present at the kit launch.

summary: Liverpool supporters expect star player Raheem Sterling to stay at the club during the 2015/16 season, as he paraded the club's new home kit designed by New Balance. The new kit, featuring a Gingham design, was unveiled at Anfield on Friday, with Sterling, Daniel Sturridge, Martin Skrtel, and Simon Mignolet presenting it to fans. The kit, which includes a memorial flame and number 96 in tribute to the Hillsborough disaster, is the first offering from New Balance, who signed a record-breaking £300 million four-year kit deal with Liverpool. Sterling, Sturridge, Skrtel, and Mignolet are expected to remain at Liverpool this season, as fans cheered them on during the launch. The new kit also features an all-white design with a new style of collar.

summary:
Here's a concise summary of the key information from the passage:

1. Liverpool unveiled their new home kit for the 2015/16 season at Anfield, designed by New Balance as part of a £300 million four-year deal.

2. Players including Raheem Sterling, Daniel Sturridge, Martin Skrtel, and Simon Mignolet modeled the new kit for fans.

3. The event occurred amid speculation about Sterling's future at the club, following his recent interview where he rejected a £100,000-a-week contract.

4. Fans expressed their desire for Sterling to stay at Liverpool, with one shouting, "make sure we see you in that next season."

5. Players discussed the upcoming FA Cup semi-final against Aston Villa at Wembley, emphasizing its importance to the team and fans.

6. The new kit features all-white branding, including the New Balance logo, Liverpool crest, and sponsor logo, along with a new collar design.

7. The shirt includes a memorial flame and the number 96 in tribute to the Hillsborough disaster victims.

summary: Raheem Sterling, a Liverpool player, was urged by fans to stay at the club during the unveiling of the team's new kit for the 2015/16 season. The kit, designed by New Balance, features a gingham pattern and tributes to the Hillsborough disaster. Sterling's future at Liverpool is uncertain after he rejected a £100,000-a-week contract and expressed interest in a potential move to Arsenal. However, Liverpool is confident he will remain at the club, with two years left on his current contract. The new kit launch also included a Q&A session and the presence of Liverpool legends like Robbie Fowler and Ian Rush.

summary: The passage describes Liverpool's unveiling of their new home kit sponsored by New Balance, valued at £300 million over four years. Raheem Sterling and other Liverpool players, including Daniel Sturridge, Martin Skrtel, and Simon Mignolet, appeared at Anfield to present the new kit to fans. Despite recent speculation about Sterling potentially leaving the club, the team emphasized their desire for him to stay. The new kit includes a white design with the club's logo and is dedicated to the victims of the Hillsborough disaster. The players also discussed upcoming matches, including the FA Cup semi-final at Wembley.

raheem sterling told the bbc that he had rejected a £ 100,000-a-week contract at liverpool prompting talk that he could leave the club
summary:
Here is a concise summary of the passage, covering the core pieces of information described:

Liverpool supporters told Raheem Sterling to remain at the club during a kit launch at Anfield, where the new home kit was unveiled. The kit, designed by New Balance, features a gingham design and is part of a record-breaking £300m four-year deal. Sterling, Daniel Sturridge, Martin Skrtel, and Simon Mignolet presented the kit to fans, and the players seemed to indicate they will all stay at the club. Sterling and Sturridge spoke about the importance of the fans and the upcoming FA Cup semi-final against Aston Villa at Wembley.

source:
raheem sterling was told in no uncertain terms by liverpool supporters that they expect him to remain at the club this summer on the day he was parading the club 's new home kit at anfield .
the new gingham design , presented to supporters at anfield on friday , is the first offering from us sports brand new balance , who struck a record-breaking £ 300million four-year kit deal to replace sister company warrior as liverpool 's suppliers .
the message was ` hold nothing back ' as sterling , daniel sturridge , martin skrtel and simon mignolet unveiled the new home strip to fans in the centenary stand on friday afternoon .
raheem sterling ( 2nd r ) models liverpool 's new kit alongside ( l-r ) adam lallana , daniel sturridge , jordan henderson and philippe coutinho
the liverpool stars , including goalkeeper simon mignolet in his new jersey , made their way to anfield to present the kit to the fans
sturridge uploaded these photographs to his instagram account as he posed with sterling , mignolet and skrtel at the launch
new balance struck a record-breaking £ 300million four-year kit deal to replace sister company warrior as liverpool 's suppliers
it looks like ( l-r ) skrtel , mignolet , sterling and sturridge will all remain at liverpool this season after unveiling in the new strip
fans pack into the centenary stand on friday afternoon to catch a glimpse of the new balance strip
raheem sterling ( left ) and daniel sturridge ( right ) sit on stage while a q&a is conducted at anfield
the players arrive at anfield as they prepare for the launch of the 2015/16 strip
only a week ago , sterling held nothing back with his stunning interview after rejecting a new £ 100,000-a-week deal at liverpool .
he also sensationally revealed that he was flattered to be linked with arsenal to cast a huge question mark over his future .
but liverpool are adamant that the 20-year-old , who has two years left to run on his contract , will not be quitting this summer and are putting their shirt on him to stay .
one fan shouted ` make sure we see you in that next season ' at sterling , and the heckle was greeted with applause .
sterling told an expectant audience : ` the fans are great .
it 's a massive boost when you come out of the changing room and hear them sing that song .
you ca n't get better than that .
while players also turned their attention to the fa cup semi-final against aston villa at wembley next weekend .
` it 's special to play at wembley , especially because it 's my home town , ' sterling said .
and sturridge added : ` winning the fa cup would be huge for everyone - players , fans and staff .
we all want to have some success and we hope it 's this season .
winning the cup could be a platform for more success in the future .
` it 's great to play in front of these fans .
it 's an unbelievable feeling .
it 's a cliche but it 's true , they are our 12th man .
every week we try to get 3 points for the fans .
they mean a lot to us . '
( l-r ) sturridge , emre can , martin skrtel , simon mignolet and coutinho pose with ` hold nothing back ' the message in the background
the memorial flame and number 96 is also on the shirt in tribute to the casualties at the hillsborough disaster in 1989
liverpool 's 2015/16 home kit ( left ) and the home goalkeepers jersey ( right ) have been designed by sponsors new balance
a close-up of the new liverpool kit for 2015/16 , which is us sports brand new balance 's first for the club
liverpool legends robbie fowler and ian rush ( left ) were also at the launch of the kit at anfield
sterling is seen here wearing the new kit inside the club 's home dressing room alongside team-mates sturridge , henderson , adam lallana and phillipe coutinho .
brazilian coutinho was the hero in midweek as he helped brendan rodgers ' side bounce back from last weekend 's bruising barclays premier league defeat by arsenal with a fine finish to book liverpool a semi-final showdown with aston villa at wembley next sunday .
although departing captain steven gerrard wo n't be around to model liverpool 's new kit next season , his dream of bowing out in the fa cup final on his birthday , may 31 , remains alive .
the new shirt features all white branding -- the new balance logo , the liverbird and the standard chartered logo , whilst there is an all-new style of collar .
skrtel said : ` it 's a great design , i just hope it will bring us some luck and success . '

summary:
Here is a concise summary of the passage, covering the core pieces of information described:

Liverpool FC unveiled their new home kit for the 2015/16 season, designed by New Balance, at Anfield. The kit was showcased by players including Raheem Sterling, Daniel Sturridge, and Simon Mignolet. Sterling's appearance sparked chants from fans urging him to stay at the club, amid speculation about his future after he rejected a £100,000-a-week contract. The new kit deal with New Balance is worth a record-breaking £300 million over four years. The players also discussed their upcoming FA Cup semi-final against Aston Villa and the importance of winning the competition.

summary: Liverpool supporters cheered Raheem Sterling on as he modeled the new Liverpool kit at Anfield. The new kit is the first offering from New Balance, who signed a record-breaking £300 million four-year kit deal to replace Warrior as Liverpool's suppliers. Sterling recently rejected a £100,000-a-week contract offer from Liverpool, but the club is adamant that he will not be leaving this summer.

summary: The passage describes Liverpool supporters expressing their expectation for Raheem Sterling to remain at the club, as they unveiled the new home kit at Anfield. The kit is designed by New Balance, who signed a £300 million four-year deal to replace Warrior as Liverpool's suppliers. Despite Sterling's recent rejection of a new contract and speculation about his future, Liverpool is determined to keep him. The players also discussed their excitement for the upcoming FA Cup semi-final against Aston Villa at Wembley.

summary: Liverpool supporters made it clear to Raheem Sterling that they expect him to stay at the club during the unveiling of the new home kit at Anfield. The kit, designed by New Balance under a record-breaking £300 million deal, was presented by Sterling, Daniel Sturridge, Martin Skrtel, and Simon Mignolet. Despite Sterling's recent interview where he rejected a £100,000-a-week contract and expressed interest in Arsenal, Liverpool insists he will not leave this summer. The event also featured a Q&A session and focused on the upcoming FA Cup semi-final against Aston Villa. The new kit includes a tribute to the Hillsborough disaster victims and was praised by players for its design.
